events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software developer role focusing on backend services.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster due to involvement of developer and software keywords.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage this candidate's application and further recruitment steps.
Initial screening with the candidate has been completed and the developer's technical background looks promising.
The candidate responded enthusiastically, confirming availability for the next interview stage and interest in the role.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the lead engineer for next Wednesday to assess software development skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview with strong performance on backend challenges and coding tasks.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and employment terms with the candidate.
The candidate successfully completed the HR interview and expressed strong motivation to join the engineering team.
A formal offer has been proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and start date options.
Candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed availability to start onboarding sessions next month.
Onboarding process for the new software developer has begun, including setup of development environment and introductions.
Recruitment case for the software developer role is now closed with successful hire joining the engineering team.
